content:
BasePackagingPolicy Class

In this Article

Defines the base class for XPS package serialization policies. This class is abstract.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class BasePackagingPolicy : IDisposable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • BasePackagingPolicy

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

Packaging policy classes provide methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different types of parts in an XpsDocument.

Constructors summary

BasePackagingPolicy()

When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the BasePackagingPolicy class.

Properties summary

CurrentFixedDocumentUri

When overridden in a derived class, gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the fixed document that is processing.
CurrentFixedPageUri

When overridden in a derived class, gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the fixed page that is processing.

Methods summary

AcquireResourceStreamForXpsColorContext(String)

When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsColorContext object.
AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont()

When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsFont object.
AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont(String)

When overridden in a derived class, acquires an XpsResourceStream for an XpsFont with a specified resource ID .
AcquireResourceStreamForXpsImage(String)

When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsImage object.
AcquireResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary(String)

When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsResourceDictionary object.
AcquireStreamForLinkTargets()

When overridden in a derived class, gets a list of strings, each expressing a LinkTarget element.
AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocument()

When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for a FixedDocument.
AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence()

When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for a FixedDocumentSequence.
AcquireXmlWriterForFixedPage()

When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for a FixedPage.
AcquireXmlWriterForPage()

When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for the current page.
AcquireXmlWriterForResourceDictionary()

When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for an XpsResourceDictionary.
PersistPrintTicket(PrintTicket)

When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.
PreCommitCurrentPage()

When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.
RelateResourceToCurrentPage(Uri,String)

When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to some internal or external resource.
RelateRestrictedFontToCurrentDocument(Uri)

When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to a font.
ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsColorContext()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsColorContext object.
ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary object.
ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont(String)

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary object.
ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsImage()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsImage object.
ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary object.
ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocument()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocument.
ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocumentSequence.
ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedPage()

When overridden in a derived class, releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedPage.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IDisposable.Dispose()

This member supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Constructors

  • BasePackagingPolicy()

    When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the BasePackagingPolicy class.

    protected BasePackagingPolicy ();

Properties

  • CurrentFixedDocumentUri

    When overridden in a derived class, gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the fixed document that is processing.

    public abstract Uri CurrentFixedDocumentUri { get; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      The Uri of the current document.

  • CurrentFixedPageUri

    When overridden in a derived class, gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the fixed page that is processing.

    public abstract Uri CurrentFixedPageUri { get; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      The Uri of the current page.

Methods

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsColorContext(String)

    When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsColorContext object.

    public abstract System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsColorContext (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The ID of the object.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The XpsResourceStream for the XpsColorContext.

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont()

    When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsFont object.

    public abstract System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont ();

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      An XpsResourceStream for the XpsFont.

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont(String)

    When overridden in a derived class, acquires an XpsResourceStream for an XpsFont with a specified resource ID .

    public abstract System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsFont (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The resource ID of the XpsFont resource stream to acquire.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The XML Paper Specification (XPS) resource stream for the XpsFont with the specified resourceID.

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsImage(String)

    When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsImage object.

    public abstract System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsImage (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The ID of the object.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The XpsResourceStream for the XpsImage.

  • AcquireResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary(String)

    When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an XpsResourceDictionary object.

    public abstract System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream AcquireResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The ID of the object.

    Returns

    • XpsResourceStream

      The XpsResourceStream for the XpsResourceDictionary.

  • AcquireStreamForLinkTargets()

    When overridden in a derived class, gets a list of strings, each expressing a LinkTarget element.

    public abstract System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> AcquireStreamForLinkTargets ();

    Returns

    • IList<String>

      An stem.Collections.Generic.IList`1 of String objects that represent the linkable targets for a page.

    Remarks

    Use the list to compose LinkTarget elements that can be inserted into the LinkTargetselement for the corresponding page. Wrap each string in the list in markup by using the following form:

    <LinkTarget Name=\" target name \" />, where target name is the string.

    For more information about the \<PageContent.LinkTargets> and LinkTarget elements, see chapter 3 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at XPS: Specification and License Downloads.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocument()

    When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for a FixedDocument.

    public abstract System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocument ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter for the FixedDocument.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence()

    When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for a FixedDocumentSequence.

    public abstract System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter for a FixedDocumentSequence.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForFixedPage()

    When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for a FixedPage.

    public abstract System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForFixedPage ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter for a FixedPage.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForPage()

    When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for the current page.

    public abstract System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForPage ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter for the current page.

  • AcquireXmlWriterForResourceDictionary()

    When overridden in a derived class, returns an XmlWriter for an XpsResourceDictionary.

    public abstract System.Xml.XmlWriter AcquireXmlWriterForResourceDictionary ();

    Returns

    • XmlWriter

      The XmlWriter for an XpsResourceDictionary.

  • PersistPrintTicket(PrintTicket)

    When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.

    public abstract void PersistPrintTicket (System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket);

    Parameters

    • printTicket
      PrintTicket

      An object that provides information about how a print job prints.

    Remarks

    This method does not validate or modify the specified printTicket for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>. If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a PrintTicket that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.

  • PreCommitCurrentPage()

    When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.

    public abstract void PreCommitCurrentPage ();
  • RelateResourceToCurrentPage(Uri,String)

    When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to some internal or external resource.

    public abstract void RelateResourceToCurrentPage (Uri targetUri, string relationshipName);

    Parameters

    • targetUri
      Uri

      The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the resource.

    • relationshipName
      String

      A name for the relationship.

    Remarks

    For more information about XML relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the Open Packaging Conventions schema.

  • RelateRestrictedFontToCurrentDocument(Uri)

    When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to a font.

    public abstract void RelateRestrictedFontToCurrentDocument (Uri targetUri);

    Parameters

    • targetUri
      Uri

      The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the font.

    Remarks

    For more information about XML relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the Open Packaging Conventions schema.

  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsColorContext()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsColorContext object.

    public abstract void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsColorContext ();
  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary object.

    public abstract void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont ();
  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont(String)

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary object.

    public abstract void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsFont (string resourceId);

    Parameters

    • resourceId
      String

      The ID of the resource that is released.

  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsImage()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsImage object.

    public abstract void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsImage ();
  • ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XpsResourceStream for the current XpsResourceDictionary object.

    public abstract void ReleaseResourceStreamForXpsResourceDictionary ();
  • ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocument()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocument.

    public abstract void ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocument ();
  • ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedDocumentSequence.

    public abstract void ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedDocumentSequence ();
  • ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedPage()

    When overridden in a derived class, releases the XmlWriter for the current FixedPage.

    public abstract void ReleaseXmlWriterForFixedPage ();

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IDisposable.Dispose()

    This member supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

    void IDisposable.Dispose ();
